body_html: @robieta I have the same question. Since the tf.data.Dataset API is expected to replace the queue runners, is there a functionality similar to batch_sequences_with_states in the Dataset API to support truncated back propagation through time? Because, clearly the batch_sequences_with_states method needs queue runners to work.
